casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Sydney Shakur MERCER 257P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 21, 2018 Grady L. Balentine, Jr., Special Deputy Attorney General, Mary Carla Babb, Assistant Attorney General, R. Andrew Murray, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Daniel Shatz, Assistant Appellate Defender, Sydney Shakur Mercer, for Mercer, Sydney Shakur.

Daniel O'Brien, Assistant Attorney General.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st of August 2018 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 21st of August 2018."
